query:
ALTER TABLE emailTemplates 
ADD COLUMN bodyJson JSON NULL,
ADD COLUMN previewHtml TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN variables JSON NULL,
ADD COLUMN usageCount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
MODIFY COLUMN category ENUM('voeux', 'presentation', 'relance', 'rendez_vous', 'suivi', 'remerciement', 'autre') NOT NULL;
